author: thorsten
msg: Reverted changes to common d2h.xsl done in r180119, because it caused a bug in pelt. I added the changes instead to leather-dev.

author: pquerna
msg: vote for mod_ssl fix, add mod_cache backport for Vary: *.

author: pquerna
msg: * mod_cache.c: When 'Vary: *' is sent, do not cache, since revalidation is always required.

author: mss
msg: * bug 3490:  on some systems, UNIX socket paths are silently truncated, let's fail with more information
* also check wether the directory for the socket exists as the error from IO::Socket::UNIX is misleading
